name: 8Bitdo Retro Mechanical Keyboard
details: Inspired by the classics. Programmable keys, Dual Super Buttons, and Super Stick, with independent control panel.

name: Womier M84 75% Wireless/Wired Mechanical Keyboard
details: 【Coral Sea Theme Ergonomic Keyboard】Womier new 75% layout mechanical keyboard in fusing art and modern technology as one, showing the coral sea pattern in 360 degrees.

name: Keychron Q1 Max RGB QMK/VIA Custom Mechanical Keyboard
details: Keychron Q1 Max, a custom wireless mechanical keyboard. Features a full metal body, a 2.4 GHz and Bluetooth wireless connection, QMK/VIA key remapping, a 1000 Hz polling rate, double-gasket design, PBT keycaps, screw-in stabilizers, and more premium features.

name: EPOMAKER TH80 Pro 75% Hot Swap RGB 2.4Ghz/Bluetooth 5.0/Wired Gaming Keyboard
details: 【75% Compact Layout Gaming Keyboard】The EPOMAKER TH80 PRO is a high-performance mechanical gaming keyboard that offers exceptional features and customization options. Designed with ergonomics in mind, with its 75% compact design, it saves valuable desk space without compromising on functionality. this compact keyboard ensures a comfortable typing and gaming experience for hours on end.
